dcterms:description: The nuScenes dataset is a multi-modal dataset for autonomous driving, providing point clouds collected by a 32-beam LiDAR and multi-view images from six cameras. It serves as a benchmark for various vision-based autonomous driving tasks.
dcterms:title: nuScenes
